person.persName: James D. Lyon (Adair County, Kentucky, stock trader)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, resident and stock trader. Adair County, Kentucky, native. Son of Robert Lyon and Catherine G. Lyon. Married to Mary F. "Fannie" Jones Lyon in Adair County on June 5, 1860. Resident of Adair County in 1850. Stock trader in Adair County in 1863.
